timeline.message:
introduce the SlingPathSuffix class

The new class allows for the easy manipulation of sling servlet
suffixes, when needed.
It should also facilitate the creation of better resource urls
without involving query parameters.

timeline.bodyText: do we allow '-' in the sufix pattern?
timeline.author: xdavidson

replies.bodyText: Yes in the pattern (the url itself). No for the parameter names.
replies.author: carlosmunoz
